Aby wyczy/zmieni t opcj otwrz prosz aplikacj AdGuard, potem przejd do ustawie, wybierz Tryb ukryty - Samoniszczce ciasteczka firm pierwszych (`Ustawienia -> Tryb ukryty -> Samoniszczce ciasteczka firm pierwszych`).

```adblock
naekranie.pl##img[alt="google-telegram"]
```

issue.title: Cosmetic filter breaks bradesco website (on desktop)

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

n/a

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome, Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

banco.bradesco

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots


commit #110526 added cosmetic filters to block banners inviting you to download an app.

But the selectors used also break the most important feature of the site on the desktop version, which is the login portion, in the removed top bar.

I suspect the `banco.bradesco#$##topBar { display: none !important; }` filter line is too generic
but the other lines added may be also causing the issue too.




### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
